meanings.definition: A person licensed to practice medicine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor helped me when I was sick.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with my doctor next week.
meanings.sent3: The doctor's office was filled with colorful toys for children.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a doctor's prescription, instantly making me feel better.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's stethoscope hung around his neck, ready for any patient.

meanings.sent1: I will doctor this wound with some antiseptic.
meanings.sent2: The nurse will doctor the patient's bandages before changing them.
meanings.sent3: He tried to doctor the broken toy with tape, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: She knew how to doctor a cold with warm soup and rest.
meanings.sent5: The chef decided to doctor up the recipe with a pinch of extra spice.
